column8: 进入超维回合后，第一张打出的非衍生指令卡额外生效 [Arg1] 次。
column9: After entering the Ultra Round, the first non-Derived Command Card played activates an additional [Arg1] times.

column8: 进入超维回合后，第一张打出的非衍生指令卡额外生效 [Arg1] 次。
column9: After entering the Ultra Round, the first non-Derived Command Card played activates an additional [Arg1] times.

column9: After entering the Ultra Round, the first non-Derived Command Card played activates an additional [Arg1] times.

column8: 进入超维回合后，第一张打出的非衍生指令卡额外生效 [Arg1] 次。
column9: After entering the Ultra Round, the first non-Derived Command Card played activates an additional [Arg1] times.

column8: 打出非衍生指令卡后，将算力消耗降低 2 的该卡牌 [Arg1]  张临时复制洗入抽牌堆，3 回合冷却。
column9: After playing a non-Derived Command Card, shuffle [Arg1] copies of it into the Draw Pile with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and 2 reduced Arithmetica Cost. Cooldown: 3 turns.

column8: 打出非衍生指令卡后，将算力消耗降低 2 的该卡牌 [Arg1]  张临时复制洗入抽牌堆，3 回合冷却。
column9: After playing a non-Derived Command Card, shuffle [Arg1] copies of it into the Draw Pile with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and 2 reduced Arithmetica Cost. Cooldown: 3 turns.

column8: 打出非衍生指令卡后，将算力消耗降低 2 的该卡牌 [Arg1]  张临时复制洗入抽牌堆，3 回合冷却。
column9: After playing a non-Derived Command Card, shuffle [Arg1] copies of it into the Draw Pile with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and 2 reduced Arithmetica Cost. Cooldown: 3 turns.

column8: 打出非衍生指令卡后，将算力消耗降低 2 的该卡牌 [Arg1]  张临时复制洗入抽牌堆，3 回合冷却。
column9: After playing a non-Derived Command Card, shuffle [Arg1] copies of it into the Draw Pile with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and 2 reduced Arithmetica Cost. Cooldown: 3 turns.

column8: 使用银钥觉醒后，选择手牌中对应唤醒体的 [Arg1] 张非衍生指令卡将其消耗，并把 [Arg2] 张附加消耗的原始复制分别置入抽牌堆、手牌堆和弃牌堆。
column9: After using Keyflare Rouse, choose [Arg1] non-Derived Command Card corresponding to that Awakener in your hand. Consume that card to place [Arg2] original copy of it into the Draw Pile, hand, and Discard Pile respectively.

column8: 使用银钥觉醒后，选择手牌中对应唤醒体的 [Arg1] 张非衍生指令卡将其消耗，并把 [Arg2] 张附加消耗的原始复制分别置入抽牌堆、手牌堆和弃牌堆。
column9: After using Keyflare Rouse, choose [Arg1] non-Derived Command Card corresponding to that Awakener in your hand. Consume that card to place [Arg2] original copy of it into the Draw Pile, hand, and Discard Pile respectively.

column8: 在首领战中，打出 20 张「虫族」非衍生指令卡后，将一张「巢群意志」置入手中。\n「巢群意志」：将所有手牌弃掉，更换为「虫族」的随机指令卡。「虫族」每回合能够释放 2 次狂气爆发。
column9: During a Boss Battle, after playing 20 "Insectoid" non-Derived Command Cards, place a "Hive Will" into hand.\n"Hive Will": Discard all cards in hand and replace them with random "Insectoid" Command Cards. "Insectoid" can unleash Exalt twice per turn.

column8: <PVPWeaponKeywords:命轮>：装备时以及「打击」前，将手牌中装备者的非衍生「技能」会按顺序变成装备者的其他「技能」。<PVPFlowerKeywords:往昔的花与诗>
column9: <PVPWeaponKeywords:Wheel of Destiny>: Upon equipping and before "Strike", the wielder's non-Derived "Skills" in your hand will sequentially change into their other "Skills".<PVPFlowerKeywords:Poetic Bygone Days>

column8: 选择 1 张手中的非衍生指令卡，获得一张附加<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>的原始复制，并使指令卡的所有者获得 <Energy:[Arg1]> 点狂气。
column9: Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card from your hand. Add a copy of that card with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust> to your hand, and grant the owner of that card <Energy:[Arg1]> Aliemus.

column8: 获得 <Posse:[Arg1]> 点银钥能量。将上回合最后打出的 3 张不同非衍生指令卡原始复制置入手中，使它们算力消耗降低 1 并获得<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>和<NothingnessIconKeywords:虚无>。若可置入手中的指令卡不足，则抽等量牌代替。
column9: Obtain <Posse:[Arg1]> Keyflare. For each of the last 3 unique non-Derived Command Cards played in the previous turn, place a copy of that card into your hand with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and 1 reduced Arithmetica Cost. If there are not enough Command Cards to place into your hand, draw a card for each Command Card missing.

column8: 获得 <Posse:[Arg1]> 点银钥能量。将上回合最后打出的 3 张不同非衍生指令卡原始复制置入手中，使它们算力消耗降低 1 并获得<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>和<NothingnessIconKeywords:虚无>。若可置入手中的指令卡不足，则抽等量牌代替。选择 1 个任意已解锁钥令替换当前钥令，使用钥令或战斗结束后恢复。
column9: Obtain <Posse:[Arg1]> Keyflare. For each of the last 3 unique non-Derived Command Cards played in the previous turn, place a copy of that card into your hand with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and 1 reduced Arithmetica Cost. If there are not enough Command Cards to place into your hand, draw a card for each Command Card missing. Choose 1 unlocked Posse to replace your current Posse. Your current Posse will be restored after using a Posse or at the End of Battle.

column8: 获得 <Posse:[Arg1]> 点银钥能量。将上回合最后打出的 3 张不同非衍生指令卡原始复制置入手中，使它们算力消耗变为 0 并获得<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>和<NothingnessIconKeywords:虚无>。若可置入手中的指令卡不足，则抽等量牌代替。选择 1 个任意已解锁钥令替换当前钥令，使用钥令或战斗结束后恢复。获得 3 层无视上限的<TimeBeacon2:负熵>。
column9: Obtain <Posse:[Arg1]> Keyflare. For each of the last 3 unique non-Derived Command Cards played in the previous turn, place a copy of that card into your hand with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and 1 reduced Arithmetica Cost. If there are not enough Command Cards to place into your hand, draw a card for each Command Card missing. Choose 1 unlocked Posse to replace your current Posse. Your current Posse will be restored after using a Posse or at the End of Battle. Obtain 3 stacks of <TimeBeacon2:Negentropy> that ignore cap.

column8: 【<DevouredIconKeywords:吞噬>：使其他唤醒体获得 <Energy:[Energy:Arg1]> 点狂气。】对所有敌人造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg2]> 点伤害，造成 [Arg3]% 伤害的<BleedingIconKeywords:出血>，并施加 [Arg4]% 伤害的<IntoxicationIconKeywords:中毒>并获得 [Arg5]% 伤害的<RetaliateIconKeywords:反击>。选择 1 张手中的非衍生指令卡，将其 2 张附加<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>和<NothingnessIconKeywords:虚无>的原始复制置入手中，使其算力消耗 -[Arg6]。
column9: [<DevouredIconKeywords:Devour>: Grant other Awakeners <Energy:[Energy:Arg1]> Aliemus.] Deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg2]> DMG to all enemies and inflict <BleedingIconKeywords:Bleed> equal to [Arg3]% DMG dealt, <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison> equal to [Arg4]% DMG dealt, and gain <RetaliateIconKeywords:Counter> equal to [Arg5]% DMG dealt. Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card in your hand, adding 2 copies with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void> and 2 reduced Arithmetica Cost to hand.

column8: 【<DevouredIconKeywords:吞噬>：使其他唤醒体获得 <Energy:[Energy:Arg1]> 点狂气。】对所有敌人造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg2]> 点伤害，造成 [Arg3]% 伤害的<BleedingIconKeywords:出血>，并施加 [Arg4]% 伤害的<IntoxicationIconKeywords:中毒>并获得 [Arg5]% 伤害的<RetaliateIconKeywords:反击>。选择 1 张手中的非衍生指令卡，将其 2 张附加<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>和<NothingnessIconKeywords:虚无>的原始复制置入手中，使其算力消耗 -[Arg6]。接下来 3 回合内，每回合开始时将 1 张「胚胎」转化为「圣洁之子」，若没有「胚胎」则将 1 张「胚胎」置入手中。
column9: [<DevouredIconKeywords:Devour>: Grant other Awakeners <Energy:[Energy:Arg1]> Aliemus.] Deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg2]> DMG to all enemies and inflict <BleedingIconKeywords:Bleed> equal to [Arg3]% DMG dealt, <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison> equal to [Arg4]% DMG dealt, and gain <RetaliateIconKeywords:Counter> equal to [Arg5]% DMG dealt. Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card in your hand, adding 2 copies with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void> and 2 reduced Arithmetica Cost to hand. For the next 3 turns, at turn start, convert 1 "Embryo" into "Scion of Purity". If there is no "Embryo" in hand, place 1 "Embryo" into hand instead.

column8: 造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点伤害。哈姆林获得 <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> 点狂气。获得 [Power:Arg3] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。若其触发「乐音」效果，获得的临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>翻倍。
column9: Deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> DMG. Hameln obtains <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> Aliemus. Obtain [Power:Arg3] Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If either <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino> or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo> are triggered, the obtained Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR> is doubled.

column8: 造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点伤害。获得 <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> 点狂气。获得 [Power:Arg3] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。若其触发「乐音」效果，获得的临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>翻倍。
column9: Deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> DMG. Obtain <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> Aliemus. Obtain [Power:Arg3] Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If either <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino> or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo> are triggered, the obtained Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR> is doubled.

column8: 获得 <Block:[Block:Arg1]> 点护盾。哈姆林获得 <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> 点狂气。获得 [Power:Arg3] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，若其触发「乐音」效果，获得的临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>翻倍。
column9: Obtain <Block:[Block:Arg1]> Shield. Hameln obtains <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> Aliemus. Obtain [Power:Arg3] Temporary<PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If either <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino> or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo> are triggered, the obtained Temporary<PowerIconKeywords:STR> is doubled.

column8: 获得 <Block:[Block:Arg1]> 点护盾。获得 <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> 点狂气。获得 [Power:Arg3] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，若其触发「乐音」效果，获得的临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>翻倍。
column9: Obtain <Block:[Block:Arg1]> Shield. Obtain <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> Aliemus. Obtain [Power:Arg3] Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If either <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino> or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo> are triggered, the obtained Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR> is doubled.

column8: 随机造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点<PunctureDamagewords:穿刺伤害> 3 次，每造成 1 次伤害<TouquKeywords:偷取>目标 [Arg2] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。选择手中 1 张不具有「乐音」的非消耗且非衍生的指令卡添加「<HuihuanaKeywords:回环乐音>」。每次若没有手牌可被添加，改为额外造成 3 次伤害
column9: Randomly deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> <PunctureDamagewords:Pierce DMG> 3 times, <TouquKeywords:Stealing> [Exhaustion:Arg2] <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR> each time. Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card in hand that does not have <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>, or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo>, and add "<HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>" to it. If there are no cards in your hand which qualify, deal an additional 3 instances of <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> instead.

column8: 随机造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点<PunctureDamagewords:穿刺伤害> 3 次，每造成 1 次伤害<TouquKeywords:偷取>目标 [Arg2] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。选择手中 1 张不具有「乐音」的非消耗且非衍生的指令卡添加「<HuihuanbKeywords:回环乐音>」。每次若没有手牌可被添加，改为额外造成 3 次伤害
column9: Randomly deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> <PunctureDamagewords:Pierce DMG> 3 times, <TouquKeywords:Stealing> [Exhaustion:Arg2] <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR> each time. Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card in hand that does not have <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>, or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo>, and add "<HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>" to it. If there are no cards in your hand which qualify, deal an additional 3 instances of <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> instead.

column8: 随机造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点<PunctureDamagewords:穿刺伤害> [Arg3] 次，每造成 1 次伤害临时降低目标 [Exhaustion:Arg2] 点<ExhaustionIconKeywords:力量>并获得 [Power:Arg2] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。选择手中 1 张不具有「乐音」的非消耗且非衍生的指令卡添加「<HuihuanaKeywords:回环乐音>」。每次若没有手牌可被添加，改为额外造成 3 次伤害
column9: Randomly deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> <PunctureDamagewords:Pierce DMG> [Arg3] times, <TouquKeywords:Stealing> [Exhaustion:Arg2] <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR> each time. Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card in hand that does not have <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>, or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo>, and add "<HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>" to it. If there are no cards in your hand which qualify, deal an additional 3 instances of <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> instead.

column8: 随机造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点<PunctureDamagewords:穿刺伤害> [Arg3] 次，每造成 1 次伤害临时降低目标 [Exhaustion:Arg2] 点<ExhaustionIconKeywords:力量>并获得 [Power:Arg2] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。选择手中 1 张不具有「乐音」的非消耗且非衍生的指令卡添加「<HuihuanbKeywords:回环乐音>」。每次若没有手牌可被添加，改为额外造成 3 次伤害
column9: Randomly deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> <PunctureDamagewords:Pierce DMG> [Arg3] times, <TouquKeywords:Stealing> [Exhaustion:Arg2] <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR> each time. Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card in hand that does not have <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>, or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo>, and add "<HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>" to it. If there are no cards in your hand which qualify, deal an additional 3 instances of <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> instead.

column8: 随机造成 <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> 点<PunctureDamagewords:穿刺伤害> [Arg3] 次，每造成 1 次伤害临时降低目标 [Exhaustion:Arg2] 点<ExhaustionIconKeywords:力量>、获得 [Power:Arg2] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>、对目标随机施加 1 种<MysterydebuffKeywords:奇妙负面效果>。选择手中 2 张不具有「乐音」的非消耗且非衍生的指令卡添加「<HuihuanbKeywords:回环乐音>」。每次若没有手牌可被添加，改为额外造成 3 次伤害
column9: Randomly deal <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> <PunctureDamagewords:Pierce DMG> [Arg3] times, <TouquKeywords:Stealing> [Exhaustion:Arg2] <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR> and inflicting 1 random <MysterydebuffKeywords:Marvelous Debuff> on the target each time. Choose 2 non-Derived Command Cards in your hand that do not have <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>, or <XushiAKeywords:Crescendo>, and add "<HuihuanaKeywords:Rondino>" to it. If there are no cards in your hand which qualify, deal an additional 3 instances of <Damage:[Damage:Arg1]> instead.

column8: <OverLimitUtlSkillKeywords:超限爆发>：每次造成伤害会对目标随机施加 1 种奇妙负面效果，额外选择 1 张不具有「乐音」的非消耗且非衍生的指令卡添加「回环乐音」。
column9: <OverLimitUtlSkillKeywords:Over-Exaltation>: Each time you deal DMG, randomly apply 1 Marvelous Debuff to the target. Choose 1 additional card when adding "Rondino".

column8: 「基础打击」和 「基础防御」获得等同于攻击力 10% 的临时力量。若其触发「乐音」效果，获得的临时力量翻倍。
column9: "Basic Strike" and "Basic Defence" obtain Temporary STR equivalent to 10% of ATK. If either "Rondino" or "Crescendo" are triggered, the obtained Temporary STR is doubled.

column8: 触发「乐音」效果或打出 「协乐的交响」后，哈姆林获得 1% 暴击率和暴击伤害。每触发 10 次，本场战斗「灵魂序曲」和「原初的乐音」伤害次数提高 1，最多提高 2 次。
column9: When triggering "Rondino" or "Crescendo" effects, or playing "Symphony of Harmony", Hameln gains 1% Crit. Rate and Crit. DMG. After 10 triggers, the number of DMG instances for "Soul Overture" and "Primal Chord" are increased by 1 in this battle, up to 2 times.

column8: 你打出的下一张非衍生指令卡算力消耗 +2，生效 2 次。
column9: The next non-Derived Command Card you play has +2 Arithmetica Cost and takes effect 2 times.

column8: 你打出的下一张非衍生指令卡算力消耗 -2。
column9: The next non-Derived Command Card you play has -2 Arithmetica Cost.

column8: 获得一张「神圣子嗣」：选择手中 1 张非衍生指令卡，获得其算力为 0 的原始复制，附加<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>和<RetainIconKeywords:保留>。
column9: Obtain a "Divine Progeny": Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card in your hand. Add a copy of that card to your hand with Arithmetica Cost set to 0, <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, and <RetainIconKeywords:Retain>.

column8: 选择 1 张非衍生指令卡，获得其算力为 0 的原始复制，附加<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>和<RetainIconKeywords:保留>。
column9: Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card in your hand. Add a copy of that card to your hand with Arithmetica Cost set to 0, <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, and <RetainIconKeywords:Retain>.

column8: 将 3 张上回合最后打出的非衍生指令卡的临时复制置入手中，使它们算力消耗变为 0。
column9: For each of the last 3 unique non-Derived Command Cards played in the previous turn, place a copy of that card into your hand with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and Arithmetica Cost set to 0.

column8: 从手牌中选择一张非衍生指令卡，其算力消耗在本场战斗中永久降低 1，并将 1 张此卡牌的复制置入手中。
column9: Choose a non-Derived Command Card from your hand. Permanently reduce its Arithmetica Cost by 1 for this battle, and add a copy of that Card into your hand.

column8: 选择 1 张非衍生指令卡，将其 10 张原始复制洗入抽牌堆。这些卡牌直到下次打出前，算力消耗降低 2。
column9: Choose 1 non-Derived Command Card and shuffle 10 original copies of it into the Draw Pile. Reduced the Arithmetica Cost of these cards by 2 until the next time they are played.

column8: 驱散所有唤醒体的<CardKeyWord:封印>状态和暴击率下降效果，移除敌方「加固」状态。将上回合最后打出的 5 张不同非衍生指令卡原始复制置入手中，使它们算力消耗变为 0 并获得<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>和<NothingnessIconKeywords:虚无>。
column9: Dispel <CardKeyWord:Sealed> state and Crit. Rate reduction effects from all Awakeners, and remove the enemy's "Fortress" state. For each of the last 5 unique non-Derived Command Cards played in the previous turn, place a copy of that card into your hand with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, <NothingnessIconKeywords:Void>, and Arithmetica Cost set to 0.

column8: 你打出的下 [Layer] 张非衍生指令卡算力消耗+2，生效 2 次。
column9: The next [Layer] non-Derived Command Card you play has +2 Arithmetica Cost and takes effect 2 times.

column8: 你打出的下 [Layer] 张非衍生指令卡算力消耗-2。
column9: The next [Layer] non-Derived Command Cards you play has -2 Arithmetica Cost.

column8: 打出非衍生指令卡后，将算力消耗降低 2 的该卡牌 1/2 张临时复制洗入抽牌堆，3 回合冷却。
column9: After playing a non-Derived Command Card, reduce the Arithmetica Cost of that card by 2 and shuffle 1/2 Temporary copies of it into the Draw Pile. This effect has a cooldown of 3 turns.

column8: 进入超维回合后，第一张打出的非衍生指令卡额外生效 1/2 次。
column9: After entering the Ultra Round, the first non-Derived Command Card played will additionally activate 1/2 times.
